mapper.sql: ddCode, ddGroup, ddName, ddPriority, ddState, ddTime, ddReward, tip, ddDesc, insertTime
mapper.select:
select
from round_ext where ddCode = #{ddcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ddGroup =TRUE

select
from round_ext where ddCode = #{ddcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ddGroup =FALSE

select
from round_ext where ddGroup = FALSE

select
from round_ext where ddGroup = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM round_ext WHERE ddGroup = FALSE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM round_ext WHERE ddGroup = TRUE
mapper.insert: insert into round_ext (ddCode,ddGroup, ddName, ddPriority, ddState, ddTime, ddReward, tip, ddDesc, insertTime) values (#{ddcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddgroup,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ddname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddpriority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddstate,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ddtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ddreward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dddesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update round_ext
ddGroup = #{ddgroup,jdbcType=BIT},
ddName = #{ddname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ddPriority = #{ddpriority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ddState = #{ddstate,jdbcType=BIT},
ddTime = #{ddtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},

tip = #{tip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ddDesc = #{dddesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ddCode = #{ddcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
